com.samskivert.swing.dnd
Class DnDManager

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.swing.dnd.DnDManager

public class DnDManager
extends Object

A custom Drag and Drop manager for use within a single JVM. Does what we need it to do and no more.

Method Summary
static void addDragSource(DragSource source, JComponent comp)
          Add the specified component as a source of drags, with the DragSource controller, and remove the source when it is removed from the component hierarchy.
static void addDragSource(DragSource source, JComponent comp, boolean autoremove)
          Add the specified component as a source of drags, with the DragSource controller.
static void addDropTarget(DropTarget target, JComponent comp)
          Add the specified component as a drop target, and remove the target when it is removed from the component hierarchy.
static void addDropTarget(DropTarget target, JComponent comp, boolean autoremove)
          Add the specified component as a drop target.
static void removeDragSource(JComponent comp)
          Remove the specified component as a drag source.
static void removeDropTarget(JComponent comp)
          Remove the specified component as a drop target.

public static void addDragSource(DragSource source,
                                 JComponent comp)
Add the specified component as a source of drags, with the DragSource controller, and remove the source when it is removed from the component hierarchy.

addDragSource

public static void addDragSource(DragSource source,
                                 JComponent comp,
                                 boolean autoremove)
Add the specified component as a source of drags, with the DragSource controller.

Parameters:
autoremove - if true, the source will automatically be removed from the DnD system when it is removed from the component hierarchy.

addDropTarget

public static void addDropTarget(DropTarget target,
                                 JComponent comp)
Add the specified component as a drop target, and remove the target when it is removed from the component hierarchy.

addDropTarget

                                 JComponent comp,

Add the specified component as a drop target.

Parameters:
autoremove - if true, the source will automatically be removed from the DnD system when it is removed from the component hierarchy.
